SELECT (MOCTA.TA001+'-'+MOCTA.TA002)AS TA001_TA002, MOCTA.TA009, MOCTA.TA010, MOCTA.TA050, MOCTA.TA054, (TB004 - TB005) AS TB004_TB005, INVMB.MB001, INVMB.MB002, INVMB.MB003, INVMB.MB017, INVMB.MB032, COALESCE(CMSMC.MC002,'') AS MC002, COALESCE(PURMA.MA002,'') AS MA002, '製令單' AS TK000 FROM [DTR_TW].[dbo].MOCTA AS MOCTA LEFT JOIN [DTR_TW].[dbo].MOCTB AS MOCTB ON (MOCTA.TA001 + MOCTA.TA002) = (MOCTB.TB001 + MOCTB.TB002) LEFT JOIN [DTR_TW].[dbo].INVMB AS INVMB ON MOCTB.TB003 = INVMB.MB001 LEFT JOIN [DTR_TW].[dbo].CMSMC AS CMSMC ON INVMB.MB017 = CMSMC.MC001 LEFT JOIN [DTR_TW].[dbo].PURMA AS PURMA ON PURMA.MA001 = INVMB.MB032
(TA011 = '1' OR TA011 = '2' OR TA011 = '3') AND (MOCTB.TB004 - MOCTB.TB005) != 0 AND MOCTB.TB018 = 'Y'
AND (MOCTA.TA001+'-'+MOCTA.TA002) like concat('%',#{TA001_TA002,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND INVMB.MB001 like concat('%',#{MB001,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND INVMB.MB002 like concat('%',#{MB002,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY INVMB.MB001 ASC, MOCTA.TA009 ASC, MOCTA.TA001+MOCTA.TA002 ASC
